You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sube;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&subE;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2ac5/index.htm U+02AC5].
  * `&sube;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2286/index.htm U+02286].
